stability.unstable: ðŸ”¬ This is a nightly-only experimental API.  (core_intrinsics)intrinsics are unlikely to ever be stabilized, instead they should be used through stabilized interfaces in the rest of the standard library

apiDescription: Stores a value if the current value is the same as the old value. The stabilized version of this intrinsic is available on the std::sync::atomic types via the compare_exchange method by passing Ordering::Relaxed as both the success and failure parameters. For example, AtomicBool::compare_exchange.
